Posts.EditableText:
To
The Forum Community,

I have created a thread to this forum yesterday for being trouble playing 'Fallout 4'. But the post has been deleted from this sub-forum. Last night I tried to open the thread to check if someone replied, but then it was not opening and I thought there might be some kind of server issue of this site.

But today when I checked my profile, I did not find the thread. I dont know what the reason for doing this. Anyway, I registered here for being a long-time member of this forum.

To
The Forum Community,

I have created a thread to this forum yesterday for being trouble playing 'Fallout 4'. But the post has been deleted from this sub-forum. But today when I checked my profile, I did not find the thread. I dont know what the reason for doing this. Anyway, I registered here for being a long-time member of this forum.
